name: Tropical Misfortune
description:
Oh No! You've Shipwrecked on the smallest island known to man! Worst of all, a bird stole your brand new Smartphone!

 Go find it.

CONTROLS:

---WASD to Move---

---SPACE to Jump---

---E to Interact---

Heads up you can double jump and wall jump. Hopefully that makes the levels slightly easier. Sorry about the Pond.
